subject: p18322589
History: Evaluation of the patient with hypoxic respiratory failure.
Findings: Portable AP chest radiograph was reviewed in comparison to prior study dated. ET tube tip, pacemaker leads, NG tube, replaced mitral valve are unchanged in appearance. There is also no change in the cardiomediastinal silhouette. Interval improvement of pulmonary edema is demonstrated which is still at least moderate. Bilateral pleural effusions are noted, small to moderate.
